Author: anonchicago7
Text: Have you tried powdered peanut butter with cashew milk.  It's really good if you cover thin slices of fruit in it and freeze them for a treat.  It's low calorie very healthy macros and nutrients so you're helping you're body and mind. Sometimes to remove an obsession you need to detach a stigma you're associating with it. So maybe you feel afraid or unworthy of eating it or it being a "no" food. But having a compromised snack like it might build a good bridge for you to take away the emotional control it seems to be having.
